name: Swedish Medical Association
membership:
The Standing Committee of European Doctors (CPME)
The European Union of Medical Specialists (UEMS)
goal: The Swedish Medical Association is the union and professional organisation for doctors. Patient safety, the work environment, salaries, working hours, training and research are some of the issues that are of great importance for the organisation.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives:
The implementation of the new professional qualifications directive in Sweden and in other EU member states.
As well as working towards exclusion of the medical professions out of the proportionality test in regulation of professions, anti-microbial resistance, eHealth initiatives.
